From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure the router to use only passive FTP connections, use the **ip ftp passive** command in global configuration mode. To allow all types of FTP connections, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.
